title: Caramel Creme Cocktail
directions: Place vanilla ice cream in a cocktail glass. Stir club soda, caramel Irish creme, vodka, and milk together in a shaker and pour over ice cream.
ingredients: 1 1/2 fluid ounces caramel Irish cream liqueur (such as Bailey's)
1 fluid ounce whipped cream-flavored vodka (such as Pinnacle)
